item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You know how they say you only hurt the ones you love? Well, it works both ways." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Today is the sort of day where the sun only comes up to humiliate you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When did the future switch from being a promise to being a threat?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Our real discoveries come from chaos, from going to the place that looks wrong and stupid and foolish." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "That's why I write, because life never works except in retrospect. You can't control life, at least you can control your version." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Amos Bronson Alcott
item.description: "Stay is a charming word in a friend's vocabulary." -- Amos Bronson Alcott

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Chance is the first step you take, luck is what comes afterward." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Isn't that how it is when you must decide with your heart? You are not just choosing one thing over another. You are choosing what you want. And you are also choosing what somebody else does not want, and all the consequences that follow. You can tell yourself, That's not my problem, but those words do not wash the trouble away. Maybe it is no longer a problem in your life. But it is always a problem in your heart." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "The shortest distance between two points is often unbearable." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Poetry is what happens when nothing else can." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Joan Crawford
item.description: "Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell." -- Joan Crawford

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplaceable being." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet." -- Plato

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Leslie add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description:
"I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart)I am never without it (anywhere I go you go,my dear; and whatever is done by only me is your doing,my darling) I fear no fate (for you are my fate,my sweet)I want no world (for beautiful you are my world,my true) and it's you are whatever a moon has always meant and whatever a sun will always sing is you
here is the deepest secret nobody knows (here is the root of the root and the bud of the bud and the sky of the sky of a tree called life; which grows higher than the soul can hope or mind can hide) and this is the wonder that's keeping the stars apart
I carry your heart (I carry it in my heart)" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Leslie add a quote by W. H. Auden
item.description: "Among those whom I like or admire, I can find no common denominator, but among those whom I love, I can; all of them make me laugh." -- W. H. Auden

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Tom Stoppard
item.description: "It is a defect of God's humor that he directs our hearts everywhere but to those who have a right to them." -- Tom Stoppard
